channel.title: Would it be possible to hack the RS server?
channel.description: Now first of all let me tell you I have no intention of hacking the RS server. I do not pretend to have the bravery, knowledge, or time associated with such a task. I'm just asking that would it be possible for someone to "hack" the RS server? How could it be done? Once again I know that it will probably never be done but I just want to speculate that if some programming god comes along if it'd be possible to do.

item.title: Would it be possible to hack the RS server?

item.description:
@chipmunk_man wrote:

The point to hack runescape would be…Skrewing up peoples accounts…Getting cash. Making yourself admin. And selling that stuff and make over 1000s of $$$$

Read full topic

rabcarl:

Now first of all let me tell you I have no intention of hacking the RS server. I do not pretend to have the bravery, knowledge, or time associated with such a task. I’m just asking that would it be possible for someone to “hack” the RS server? How could it be done? Once again I know that it will probably never be done but I just want to speculate that if some programming god comes along if it’d be possible to do.

Yeah, Not that hard to hack… But what is the point in hacking? its like playing moparscape ffs lol… Btw Try www.talkgeek.com this community dosnt help hackers… talkgeek doo =) reffer T0rt3x Too

item.title: Would it be possible to hack the RS server?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Who ever is capable of doing it wouldn’t waste their time and risk getting busted just for a child’s game. So in short: possible? Yep, probably ever going to happen? Nope.
